content: quote: Originally posted by Irwin_R_Schyster: quote: Originally posted by adminnco1: We should agree to keep this thread free of all the political blather and use it solely as a memorial. Yes we SHOULD, but the liberal response to the murder of Dr.Tiller will get a response itself.. I see nothing different here....Army soldiers gunned down like animals in front of a recruiting station.. Who was it that demanded the Marines leave Berkeley california?? I very rarely agree with adminnco, but on this one he is right. This thread should be a memorial to the soldier who was killed and the one who was wounded. This thread is about "Two US Army Hometown Recruiter's Assistants Shot and Killed." It is NOT about Liberals or Conservatives. It is NOT about the murder of Dr. Tiller, or the subject of abortion. No one starts a war--or rather, no one in his senses ought to do so--without first being clear in his mind what he intends to achieve by that war and how he intends to conduct it. Carl von Clausewitz
